lazyPreloading.hint: Set browser (e.g. Chrome, Edge) network to Fast or Slow 3G to see the effect
lazyPreloading.hint2: Panel2 is simply loaded by React.lazy witch will show a full page Suspense loading page (Has page flash effect)
lazyPreloading.hint3: Panel3 is loaded by lazyWithPreload (No page flash effect) and withProcessIndicator for indicating loading state

sequentialProcessing.hint: Click '$t(action.run)' to start process simulation by running random timeout processes
sequentialProcessing.hint2: When process number >= error number, it will throw a error

msg.start: Process {{idx}} started at {{time}}, timeout: {{timeout}}, previous value {{previous}}
msg.aborted: The processing has been aborted at step {{step}}, value {{value}}

slowRoute.hint: This page was showed after a intentional timeout, you saw a routing progress bar if you navigate to this page by the link in home page
slowRoute.hint2: If you navigate to this page directly (e.g. by url directly, or clicking browser reload), you will see a blank loading page first, then see the content

msg.tokenCalculation: It cloud contains {{tokenNum}} tokens in the markdown
